description: This source file implements a platform-independent utility function for creating a Daemon Engine UDP object in the ANSC (Advanced Networking Service Container) framework. It primarily defines the function 'AnscCreateDaemonEngineUdp' which calls another creation function.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE AnscCreateDaemonEngineUdp(ANSC_HANDLE hContainerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hAnscReserved)
methods.description: Creates a new Ansc Daemon Engine Udp object by invoking the underlying creation function 'AnscDeuoCreate' with the provided context handles.
